name: quantum-site-ts
description: A Quantum Site TypeScript web application

scripts.tokens: for f in build/*.htm; do sed -i '' s/\{\{version\}\}/$(date +%s)/g $f; done
scripts.build: yarn;yarn clean;yarn assets;tsc;cp ./.env build/;cp ./src/*.htm build/;yarn tokens;cp serverless.yml build;cp package.json build;
scripts.deploy: yarn build;cd build;../node_modules/.bin/sls deploy --stage dev --mode remote;cd ..
scripts.deploy-prod: yarn build;cd build;../node_modules/.bin/sls deploy --stage prod --mode remote;cd ..

author: Gio Palacino <gio@palacino.net>
